Key Match Events: Jhon Córdoba scored the opening goal for Colombia in the 8th minute
James Rodríguez scored a powerful penalty kick in the 18th minute
Luis Díaz scored Colombia's third goal in the 41st minute
Richard Ríos scored Colombia's fourth goal in the 70th minute
Miguel Borja converted a penalty kick for the final goal in stoppage time
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia came into the match on a 26-match unbeaten streak
The heavily-favored Colombians enjoyed a home field advantage in front of a crowd of 39,740 at State Farm Stadium
Panama's unexpected run to the quarterfinals included a 2-1 win over the United States during group play
Others: Colombia will play in the semifinals on Wednesday in Charlotte, North Carolina, against Uruguay
Los Canaleros could never make a dent in the lead
The stadium’s retractable roof was closed because of temperatures that hovered around 115 degrees Fahrenheit (46 degrees Celsius) outside
